name: Siren
temple_description:
Siren was the daughter of the river god Ekrous, a beautiful fairy born from his blood. Due to her defeat by Muse in a music contest, her wings were removed by Muse, rendering her unable to fly.
After losing her wings, she often transforms into a mermaid and lures nearby sailors to disaster with her enchanting music and singing voice.

active_skills.name: Surging Waves
active_skills.effect: 80% chance to [Poison], causing them to lose 3% of current HP for 4 rounds

active_skills.name: Neptune's Roar
active_skills.effect: If the target is under [Poison], they will receive [Stun] for 1 round
